chat.greeting: Hello! I am your Finflow Assistant. You can tell me about your expenses or income via text, receipt image, or voice.

about.title: About & Feedback
about.description: Welcome to the future of personal finance tracking. This application utilizes advanced Artificial Intelligence (Google Gemini) to simplify how you record and analyze your daily transactions.
about.voice_text_desc: Simply speak or type your expenses naturally. "Bought coffee for 25k" is all you need to say.
about.smart_cat_desc: The AI automatically understands context and categorizes your transactions instantly.
about.support_desc: Enjoying Finflow? Your support helps me keep the AI running and develop new features.
about.premium_desc: Elevate your financial management with our pro tools.
about.premium_receipt: Scan as many receipts as you want without daily limits (Free users limited to 3 scans/day).
about.premium_voice: Unlimited voice input every day (Free users are limited to 10 inputs/day).
about.premium_pdf: Download beautiful monthly summaries with visual summaries and category charts.
about.premium_insights: Advanced AI analysis to help you balance income and expenses.
about.feedback_desc: We value your input! Tell us what you like or what we can improve.
about.success_msg: Your feedback has been sent successfully.
